THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.visual_reinforcement_of_title: The text 'SPOTTING AUTISM' directly repeats the core of the title, visually anchoring the subject. The friendly and open expressions of the people—with one person embracing the other—may symbolize the supportive context of high-masking adults with autism.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: No direct visual reference to autism or 'high-masking' as a concept. The tone is friendly rather than clinical, possibly appealing to a broad audience rather than focusing on the hidden or masked aspects implied in the title.
